attributes.action: increase the minimum wage of 16 year olds to that of adults the age of 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The minimum wage of 16 to 17 year olds is £3.53 per hour, whereas the minimum wage of 18 to 21 year olds is £4.77 per hour, yet there is not much of a gap between 16 and 18.
